you're trying to run Maya in Wine?

that's really pushing the limits on what you could hope Wine can do. You should be looking at Virtualbox if it can handle the graphics, or Blender if you're not tied to Maya.
Virtualbox? is it hard to setup?
No, as long as you have a Windows CD handy. I'm guessing you have a fairly modern machine with 1 GB or more of RAM.
yea i have my windows XP cd
2GB DDR2 800
4ghz CPU
any links to the best virtual box?
I believe it's available with apt-get, let me check if there's any tips.
!virtualbox | RoCUnreal
I've been using the free edition for a couple months now with good results. You'll probably want to d/l the user manual too, at http://195.34.175.98/download/UserManual.pdf
